abstract: The New York Times Company has decided not to sell The Boston Globe, the company said Wednesday — an indication that it did not think the bids it received were high enough to merit a sale.
snippet: The New York Times Company has decided not to sell The Boston Globe, the company said Wednesday — an indication that it did not think the bids it received were high enough to merit a sale.

headline.main: New York Times Co. Decides Not to Sell Boston Globe
